pages.text: Raytrace Fluids allows the gadget(s) to interact with fluids. When turned on, exchangers can swap out fluids, and builders can build on top of fluids. $(br2)When turned off, these gadgets will ignore fluids, and build on the blocks behind them.$(br2)See the chapter on $(l:buildinggadgets2:mech_fluid_handling)Fluid Handling$(/l) for more details.
